title: Pentakill 3 album PLS
body:
I don't know how many others like/love the pentakill albums, but I'm really hoping a third one is coming.
I'm hoping it has some good song names, maybe like:
Stormrazor
Death's Dance
Phantom Dancer
Wit's End
Guardian Angel
Trinity Force

I don't know, but I think some metal songs with those names could be pretty darn awesome.

Plus the fact i've recently gotten into them and only had a small selection of songs is KILLING MEEEEE pls rito bless us with pentakill album 3 (Maybe with the morde VGU?){{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}} {{sticker:sg-lux}}

replies.body: Who exactly is downvoting this post? I thought people liked Pentakill.

IKR?
 
Evidently they have poooorr tastes lul{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

> [{quoted}](name=EdgeLady,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=mM90Umxi,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2019-04-07T17:06:34.695+0000)
>
> Who exactly is downvoting this post? I thought people liked Pentakill.

Not everyone. Personally, I thought both albums were bland and forced, and not worth listening to again.

> [{quoted}](name=KFCeytron,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=mM90Umxi,comment-id=00030001,timestamp=2019-04-14T04:12:09.643+0000)
>
> Not everyone. Personally, I thought both albums were bland and forced, and not worth listening to again.

People are entitled to that opinion, but that doesn't mean they have to bring that negativity to the posts of people who *do* like that music and want to see more. It's unwarranted.

> [{quoted}](name=EdgeLady,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=mM90Umxi,comment-id=000300010000,timestamp=2019-04-14T18:18:22.321+0000)
>
> People are entitled to that opinion, but that doesn't mean they have to bring that negativity to the posts of people who *do* like that music and want to see more. It's unwarranted.

0. You asked who might be downvoting.
0. This is a discussion forum.

Redemption
Knight's Vow
Lifeline
Lich Bane
Essence Reaver
Executioner's Calling


**So many potential song names!**

I've been dreaming of a third Pentakill album with Xerath as a new harsh vocalist. I think he has the perfect voice for it. Plus, he's way overdue for a skin and I would consider this a worthy addition.
I think Riot usually tries to trend towards doing something new and unique every other year when it comes to music related skins rather than add on what we already have

Kayle just got her rework too, and her Pentakill skins was one of the best ones that was redone (helped by the fact that it was already an epic skin in the first place). And with Morde's rework coming right after I'd say we're almost definitely getting new Pentakill content this year.

GIEB MOAR PENTAKILL NAO PLZ K THX.

And cross it over with K/DA too, please. Suqling's work is wholesome and I want to see it canon.
I mean the second one only happened cause they made a Pentakill Kayle skin... who gets a new skin the next time? XD
